title: Murder on the Orient Express: The List Special Edition 11.02.2017 - 10 PM
description:
Tonight on The List, we were inspired by the film, Murder on the Orient Express! Curator and host, Colleen Lopez, takes the guesswork out of style by showcasing her weekly favorites.

*Prices shown on the previously recorded video may not represent the current price.  Visit http://www.hsn.com to view the current selling price. Shop The List on HSN!

asset.title: HSN | Murder on the Orient Express: The List Special Edition 11.02.2017 - 10 PM
